snippet: A small fraction of the 17 million books, pamphlets, prints, and other memorabilia in the National Library of Medicine is rediscovered in a new book.
abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger reviews book Hidden Treasure: The National Library of Medicine, edited by Michael Sappol.
lead_paragraph: A small fraction of the 17 million books, pamphlets, prints, and other memorabilia in the National Library of Medicine is rediscovered in a new book.
